channel.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V2 [Full Version] [Converted To Matrix Format]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2cijon7.png[/img]
Sam Akin is a noob This is The Full Version Same Content Just more added to it And this is also the matrix Version
[size=12pt]Here are the features[/size] - Grand Exchange (buying only if you fix sell just let me know) - All Auras - Flaming skulls - Polypore Dungeon - Dungeoneering 100% - 1 npc for all weapons and armours - all pets - Dragonbone - Flaming Skulls - 725 cache - Anti lagg system - vote4cash - much more etc..
[size=12pt][u][b]Features:[/b][/u][/size] - Switching is near perfect - All Spellbooks are accessible via Commands and altars - Storm of Armadyl, New boots, and more. - Armours such as Torva, Barrows, and PvP Armour Degrade when in use and when they are dropped in PvP - Auras are all complete except for Salvation and Corruption bonuses work wings are glitched
(Bosses) - King Black Dragon with all attacks and effects - Tormented Demons with all 3 switches - Full Nex with all 4 stages (Flawless) - Godwars - Corporeal beast with Impact hits and all correct attacks - Frost dragons - Dominion Tower - Barrows{prizes glitchy still} & More...
Pvp/PK/PVM/Combat - Near Perfect combat, 99.9% flawless - Switching better than RS - Full Summoning!! - Armour set effects all added! - Degrading Pvp Armours - Storm Of Armadyl Spell - Flawless Prayer system (Normal/Ancient Prayers/Lunar)
Random Stuff: - All special attacks working properly for Most Weapons! - Quick Chat 100% - music everyone knows that - custom maps - donorzones staffzones and more
Armours/Bosses: - All new 721 armours obv we all know - Bosses are upgraded to new looks - Jad waves maxed out to 65 - Armours are almost all update to date with bonuses and stats - Each armour that need requirements on RS is same on here now - Quests are partially made
[b]Polypore Dungeon[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/30j4v0p.png[/img] [b]Grand Exchange[/b] There is no red green or yellow colors the action is instant so there is no waiting time until i get more players then i will base it more on eco [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/j12h40.png[/img] [b]Dungeoneering[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/3133e2t.png[/img] [b]Queen Black Dragon[/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/4rpc42.png[/img] [b]Flaming Skulls (this picture everyone loves to see so i put in for fun)[/b] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2q01xnc.png[/img] [b]Emotes for loyalty points[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/huj5sg.png[/img]
Much more to come
This is the source and cache together THERE IS NO ANTI-LEECH as much as I wanted but I wont the server will start up perfectly although there are anti leeches within the source to prevent you from having everything
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?e1bxcif50tzzssu]Source[/url]
CREDITS TimeRS3 Zingerman111 Prothieum laakerules Matrix (for interface)
[size=14pt]YOUR ALOUD TO RELEASE THIS AGAIN WHERE EVER JUST PLEASE REMEMBER TO GIVE CREDITS TO ONLY THOSE I HAVE SAID ABOVE NO OTHER SHOULD BE ADDED IN AND IF YOU FIX GRAND EXCHANGE LET ME KNOW TOO I DONT WANT FULL VERSION RELEASED TO PUBLIC[/size][/center]

item.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V2 [Full Version] [Converted To Matrix Format]
item.dc:creator: @Haro123 Haro123
item.description:
@Haro123 wrote:

I’ve got the source and Matrix client, I’ve changed the client IP to localhost and compiled the source. But when I run the source it says

“[Launcher] Initing Cache…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19
at com.rs.utils.Utils.getItemDefinitionsSize(Utils.java:268)
at com.rs.cache.loaders.ItemsEquipIds.init(ItemsEquipIds.java:13)
at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:64)”

Then when I run the 718 Matrix client it says:

“error_game_js5connect”

Yeah I’m quite new to RSPS but I get like every server up but for some reason I can’t get this one up. It looks amazing so please help?

Oh yeah and I’ve also changed the Jdk and Jre to mine, both of which are Jre7 and JDK1.7.0_03

Read full topic

item.title: ๖ۣۜNRS3server V2 [Full Version] [Converted To Matrix Format]
item.dc:creator: @champy champy
item.description:
@champy wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:89, topic:460517”][quote author=champy link=topic=563445.msg4120531#msg4120531 date=1349656751]
Still can’t get this to work. I’ve tired multiple clients. Server starts fine. Client get to updating 99% then crashes. I’ve tried switching the sub from 1 to 3 to 7 and nothing works.
[/quote]

keep the sub at 3 make sure your ports are open and also check your sub on source aswell they must both be the exact same in order for the client to work

before you do anything make sure localhost is working.[/quote]

Alright. I updated my cache to 734 and now it just crashed on startup. Apparently this means I have the client packed incorrectly? Could you upload a working 734 client for this? In the meantime I shall try to pack it myself.

Read full topic

Still can’t get this to work. I’ve tired multiple clients. Server starts fine. Client get to updating 99% then crashes. I’ve tried switching the sub from 1 to 3 to 7 and nothing works.

before you do anything make sure localhost is working.
